alert.note: Alert for Cass; Sarpy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 3:22PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Mills, northeastern Sarpy and northeastern Cass Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 321 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Offutt AFB, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Offutt AFB around 325 PM CDT. Plattsmouth around 335 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pacific Junction. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 35 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
